text: usane kaha, "ai meree qaum ke logo! tumhaara kya vichaar hai? yadi main apane rab ke ek spasht pramaan par hoon aur usane mujhe apanee or se achchhee aajeevika bhee pradaan kee (to jhuthalaana mere lie kitana haanikaarak hoga!) aur main nahin chaahata ki jin baaton se main tumhen rokata hoon svayan svayan tumhaare vipareet unako karane lagoon. main to apane bas bhar keval sudhaar chaahata hoon. mera kaam banana to allaah hee kee sahaayata se sambhav hai. usee par mera bharosa hai aur usee kee or main rujoo karata hoon
